statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedules;
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE start_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT end_time, start_time FROM EmployeeSchedules ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT schedule_date, employee_id FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE end_time > '18:00:00' ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE employee_id = 1 ORDER BY schedule_date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, TIME_FORMAT(start_time, '%h:%i %p') AS start_time_formatted, end_time FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE schedule_date = CURDATE();

SELECT employee_id, DATE_FORMAT(schedule_date, '%M %e, %Y') AS schedule_date_formatted, SEC_TO_TIME(TIME_TO_SEC(end_time) - TIME_TO_SEC(start_time)) AS hours_worked FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_schedules FROM EmployeeSchedules GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_schedules > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, MIN(schedule_date) AS first_schedule_date, MAX(schedule_date) AS latest_schedule_date FROM EmployeeSchedules GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY first_schedule_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE employee_id = 123
SELECT schedule_date, end_time FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE schedule_date = '2023-01-05'
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM TaskAssignments WHERE assigned_to = 456 ORDER BY deadline ASC
SELECT employee_id, start_time FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE start_time >= '08:00:00' AND end_time <= '17:00:00'
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignments WHERE deadline > '2023-02-15'
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM TaskAssignments WHERE assigned_to = 2 ORDER BY deadline DESC
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01' AND schedule_date <= '2022-01-31'
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM TaskAssignments WHERE deadline > '2022-03-15' AND deadline < '2022-04-15' ORDER BY task_name ASC
SELECT employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE start_time < '09:00:00' AND end_time > '17:00:00'
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule;
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT task_id, employee_id, assigned_date, completion_status FROM task_assignment ORDER BY assigned_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department, position FROM employee_details WHERE department='HR';
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT task_id, assigned_date, completion_status FROM task_assignment WHERE completion_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM Task WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, date, start_time, end_time FROM Schedule WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT schedule_id, employee_name, date, start_time, end_time FROM Schedule INNER JOIN Employee ON Schedule.employee_id = Employee.employee_id;
SELECT task_name, task_description, estimated_duration FROM Task WHERE estimated_duration > 5 ORDER BY task_name DESC;

SELECT assignment_id, task_name, employee_name, assigned_date, completion_status FROM Assignment INNER JOIN Task ON Assignment.task_id = Task.task_id INNER JOIN Employee ON Assignment.employee_id = Employee.employee_id WHERE completion_status = true ORDER BY assigned_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedule;
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, task FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT task_id, assigned_employee_id, due_date, status FROM TaskAssignment WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT first_name, last_name, position FROM Employee WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM Department ORDER BY department_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT task, schedule_date FROM EmployeeSchedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, t.task_name FROM Employee e JOIN TaskAssignment ta ON e.employee_id = ta.assigned_employee_id JOIN Task t ON ta.task_id = t.task_id
SELECT t.task_name, t.description FROM Task t JOIN TaskAssignment ta ON t.task_id = ta.task_id WHERE ta.due_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, d.department_name FROM Employee e JOIN Department d ON e.position = d.department_name
